comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Chorus girl Florence Huber married industrial heir Thomas Franklyn "Tommy" Manville in 1911, when he was just 17; they had known each other just five days. That was the first of his thirteen marriages (to eleven different women). en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tommy_Manville

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: He lived happily, and married ever after . . . .

comment.author: 70251312@N00
